node.title: I Want to See Jesus
node.description: "Often when we are facing sorrows and griefs, we think of the times when Jesus was on earth, wishing He was somewhere near in our day.  Then, we would go to Him and tell Him our sorrows, and He would accept us and have mercy upon us.  Yet, what if there was a way for us to see Jesus today?  This message utilizes the messages of OT and NT prophets as well as to Sanctuary to show that one of the offices of the Holy Spirit is to help us to see Jesus and sense His presence."
